abstract: Jean Uwinkindi, pastor accused of leading and coordinating attacks on Tutsis during Rwanda's 1994 genocide, is sentenced to life imprisonment.
lead_paragraph: The pastor was accused of leading and coordinating attacks on minority Tutsis during Rwanda’s 1994 genocide.

headline.print_headline: Africa; Rwanda: Pastor Jailed for Life

snippet: The pastor was accused of leading and coordinating attacks on minority Tutsis during Rwanda’s 1994 genocide.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
